recipesJson.name: Smooth Morning Kick Remix
recipesJson.author: PjStarTV
recipesJson.description: This is my adaptation of Smooth Morning Kick (by Lars on ELR).  I use FA Cappuccino instead of the Tiramisu and add TPA Meringue to give a little more sweet creaminess to the mix.  This needs a good 7 days steep to really blend the flavors but it's one of the best coffee juices I've had.  Fantastic in the morning but great as an ADV as well.
